decisions.description: Determine if the selected queues are in the group (queue) collection

decisions.description: Determine whether: - The case is updated - The case is cloned - There is a validation error
decisions.name: DEC_Splt
decisions.label: Split

rules.name: OUT_Error
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8) AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12) OR (11 AND 13 AND 14) OR (12 AND 13 AND 15)
rules.label: Error

Flow.description: Allocate a case to a selected queue and set the case's priority

fields.name: DT_Error_1
fields.fieldText:
﻿An error has occurred.


Please refer the error to your System Adminstrator.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: DT_Error_2
fields.fieldText:
You do not have the necessary system permissions to use this function.


Please refer to your System Adminstrator.
